required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Indices of Body Composition During Ultramarathon : Measure by Body Bioelectrical Impedance
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Indices of Body Composition During Ultramarathon : Measure by Body Bioelectrical Impedance

brief_summary.textblock: Prospective cohort, monocentric non-randomized and interventional clinical study in ICU assessing the evolution of body composition using bioelectrical impedance analysis.

detailed_description.textblock: Prospective, monocentric non-randomized and interventional clinical study in ICU assessing the evolution of body composition using bioelectrical impedance analysis (phase angle, fat mass, muscle mass, fat-free mass, body water) before and after ultramarathon.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Diagnostic

primary_outcome.measure: Difference of fat-free mass, using bioelectrical impedance analysis
primary_outcome.time_frame: before and after ultramarathon of 105 km (at day 1)

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference of phase angle, using bioelectrical impedance analysis
Correlation between order in the course,duration of course and indices of body composition

intervention.intervention_name: body bioelectrical impedance performed by Z-Métrix (class IIa) - BIOPARHOM 12 allée des lacs de garde, Savoie Technolac BP 238, 73374 Bourget du lac, France

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participation to ultramarathon
Exclusion Criteria:
- pregnancy women
